NAME: Orb of Jyun
DESCRIPTION: Move to an ally not holding an Orb of Jyun. The Conduit loses 2 Energy and the target gains 1 Energy.

NAME: Sooth
DESCRIPTION: You and each Orb of Jyun holder gain 2 Health.

NAME: Energize
DESCRIPTION: Spend the rest of your Energy. Heal 1 chosen Orb of Jyun holder for the amount of Energy spent.

NAME: Cleanse
DESCRIPTION: You and each Orb of Jyun holder discard all Boss Status cards applied to yourselves.

NAME: Discharge
DESCRIPTION: Spend the rest of your Energy. Deal damage equal to the Energy spent.

NAME: Feedback
DESCRIPTION: Gain Energy equal to the number of cards in your hand (other than Feedback).

NAME: Infuse
DESCRIPTION: You and each Orb of Jyun holder draw 2 cards.
